title: Forensic Traversing Notes - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Mystery   Romance   Shounen Ai
tags: Age Regression   Ancient China   Army   Arrogant Characters   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Court Official   Cute Protagonist   Death   Eidetic Memory   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Mature Protagonist   Modern Knowledge   Murders   Mystery Solving   Older Love Interests   Polite Protagonist   Previous Life Talent   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Shota   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Wealthy Characters
author: Luo Bin   络缤
description:
Due to an accidental transmigration and a strange combination of circumstances, a forensic expert had mistakenly ended up as the wandering son of a valued noble. With difficulties that others would not expect, he had gone from being a bogus countryside Buddhist monk to taking up the role of a rich family son. Besides, a similar constitution to Conan had also made his life sufferable.

It seems like a better choice to resume one’s old profession of performing post-mortem examinations and crack cases instead of being a silent good looking boy.>
